title: Arrays and Loops in Scala
text: Using Scala, write a program that first creates an array consisting of the first five multiples of 10, and then sums all these multiples. In one line print 'All array elements: ' followed by a list of space-separated array elements. Append a whitespace to the end of this list, too. In another line, print out 'Sum of all array elements: ' followed by your computed sum!

test.code: This is the code the student should have typed in
test.output:
All array elements: 10 20 30 40 50 
Sum of all array elements: 150
